group_1.textRight: Why did you have Kanoko's clothes on hand?

group_1.textLeft: They were supposed to be used for an event at the@mall.

group_1.textRight: Supposed to?

group_1.textLeft: Yep!
I thought the kids would like it...
But when I put it out there, they were all super@scared.

group_1.textRight: Thus, they've been sleeping in the counseling office@until now...
Is this the last outfit?

group_1.textLeft: Yep.
Thank you so much for today!
It's nice to make small clothes, but...
I didn't have any kids to model them!

group_1.textRight: I had fun too!
It was my first time wearing artsy clothes like these,@so...
I felt like a real model!
Let me know when you have new clothes, Kanotan!

group_1.textLeft: Of course!
*Sigh* That was fun!
Everyone knows a lot about fashion, and the things@they talk about are interesting...
I'll come back here to play.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I'm glad you made friends!
Hmm, what's the matter?

group_1.textLeft: ...Can I call Kanotan and the others my friends?

group_1.textRight: I think it's fine, but why do you ask?

group_1.textLeft: Because...Kanotan is about the same age as my@sister.
It's like she was playing with me because I'm@younger than her.

group_1.textRight: Hmm, I don't think that's the case...
I think Kanoko really enjoyed it.

group_1.textLeft: Hey, are there any Magical Girls around my age?

group_1.textRight: The same age as you...
Riko is a Magical Girl in elementary school...
And then there's Iroha's sister, Ui...
And the amazing geniuses, Touka and Nemu...
I think they're around your age.

group_1.textLeft: Amazing geniuses...
(...I don't think they'll be on the same page as me.)
...I'll think about it for a bit.
Thank you for today, Himitan.

group_1.textRight: I'm baack...

group_1.textLeft: Ah, Mii...

group_1.textRight: Hey, Sis, you're early today.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, there were a few things...
...Hey, Mii, have you been playing with Sudachi?

group_1.textRight: No, I was playing with Himitan today.

group_1.textLeft: Is that so...
Um, Mii...
I don't think you should see Himika for a while.

group_1.textRight: ...Why?

group_1.textLeft: To tell you the truth...
A Magical Girl named Ui has been kidnapped.

group_1.textRight: Ui...@Iroha's younger sister...

group_1.textLeft: That's right...
The culprit is a group called the Promised Blood.
If anything happens to you, Mii...
I really don't want to say this, but...
Stay away from the members of the Kamihama@Magia Union as much as possible.
And don't tell anyone that you're a Magical Girl.
Please...

group_1.textRight: ...Got it.

group_1.textCenter: We've gotten so close, but it's not going well.
